name: Three-Bar Reversal Volume Spike Strategy
description: Price-action strategy for large-cap U.S. equities on daily bars. It detects three-bar bullish or bearish reversals confirmed by a ≥150 % volume spike over the 20-day average. Risk is capped at 1 % of equity with a 2×ATR(14) stop and 4×ATR(14) profit target; exits also occur on pattern failure or after 7 days. Only one position per symbol is allowed and no pyramiding.
